channel.title: Project Perfection - Team
channel.description:
Originally Posted by Furyz 317's have been put aside by most, and have nowhere near been yet perfected. One thing at a time, and first thing is first. 317.
On RuneLocus Welcome to Project Perfection. We are out to make a *Perfect* 317. What's that mean?. Good question . It will probably look something like... ----------------- Current Goals: (One / = Not started) (Two // = Started, however no where near done) (Three // = Started, more than 50% done) (Four // = Completed) 503+ Items: Dragon Platebody / Dragon Claws /// Dungeoneering Skill Cape //// Dagon'Hai / All PVP Armor /// Vesta /// Status /// Zuriel /// Dark Bow /// Dragon Pickaxe / Sword of Light / A 317 counterpart to a working G.E / Perfect Combat/Skilling /// A Perfect, Complex, and Stable Economy // ReAL God Wars / Full Slayer (With tasks associated with your CB level) / Duel Arena / Perfect Pest Control //// Real (63 Wave) Fight Caves / GodSwords with correct specials and stances /// GodSword making via shards / Enhanced Herblore / Working Skill Menus /// Real Skillcape emotes / A Donator City built from scratch / Custom Quests // Kalphite Queen, with two forms / Clan Chat working without having to type ::Ccjoin / These are just what I can think of off the top of my head Pictures Soon to be added ---------------------- POSITIONS [Leader] -Please [Head Progammer] [Server Programmer] OPEN [Server Programmer] OPEN [Server Programmer] OPEN [GFX Designer] [Beta Tester] ArcticPkz [Beta Tester] Saviour [Beta Tester] OPEN [Beta Tester] OPEN [Beta Tester] OPEN [Beta Tester] OPEN [Beta Tester] OPEN [Beta Tester] OPEN [Beta Tester] OPEN [Beta Tester] OPEN -- SUPPORTERS If you support this project, please join our group by clicking here ! Hosting Info: Beta will be either off of my comp or on a VPS. The full version, however, will be on a VPS for sure.

item.title: Project Perfection - Team
item.dc:creator: @Please1 -Please
item.description:
@Please1 wrote:

Originally Posted by Furyz 317's have been put aside by most, and have nowhere near been yet perfected. One thing at a time, and first thing is first. 317.
On RuneLocus

Welcome to Project Perfection. We are out to make a Perfect 317. What’s that mean?. Good question . It will probably look something like…

Current Goals:

(One / = Not started)

(Two // = Started, however no where near done)

(Three // = Started, more than 50% done)

(Four // = Completed)

503+ Items:

Dragon Platebody /
Dragon Claws ///
Dungeoneering Skill Cape ////
Dagon’Hai /
All PVP Armor ///

Vesta ///
Status ///
Zuriel ///

Dark Bow ///
Dragon Pickaxe /
Sword of Light /

A 317 counterpart to a working G.E /
Perfect Combat/Skilling ///
A Perfect, Complex, and Stable Economy //
ReAL God Wars /
Full Slayer (With tasks associated with your CB level) /
Duel Arena /
Perfect Pest Control ////
Real (63 Wave) Fight Caves /
GodSwords with correct specials and stances ///
GodSword making via shards /
Enhanced Herblore /
Working Skill Menus ///
Real Skillcape emotes /
A Donator City built from scratch /

Custom Quests //

Kalphite Queen, with two forms /

Clan Chat working without having to type ::Ccjoin /

These are just what I can think of off the top of my head

Pictures
Soon to be added
